Name: L'apocalypse Ultime (The ultimate Apocalypse)
Ingredients: 2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: STIR first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with sparkling wine.
Review: This cognac and champagne cocktail is dry and boozy with hints of zesty orange.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Alexander Sourmpatis at Spinte at The Whisky Bar, Thessaloniki, Greece. Alexander's original recipe calls for Martell Cordon Bleu cognac.
Nutrition: One serving of L'apocalypse Ultime (The ultimate Apocalypse) contains 176 calories
